dict.acceptation: 技巧，技术，手段；技能；手法；

sent.orig: These techniques covered JavaBean technique, Servlet technique, EJB technique and Database Access etc.
sent.trans: 这些技术涵盖了JavaBean技术、Servlet、EJB技术以及数据库访问等。

sent.orig: Three of the most important components of swimming are: technique technique technique.
sent.trans: 游泳最重要的三个组成部分是：技术技术还是技术。

sent.orig: It includes superficial stratumseismic brightness technique, AVO, seismic attributes analysis technique and seismicinversion technique.
sent.trans: 包括浅层地震亮点技术，识别气藏的叠前AVO技术，叠后地震属性分析技术和地震反演技术。

sent.orig: Different approaches, such as the two-incision lateral technique and the dorsolateral technique, have been described.
sent.trans: 不同的入路都有过描述，如双切口外侧技术和后外侧技术。

sent.orig: Gene chip technique was a kind of new technique life area which was developed since 1990′s.
sent.trans: 基因芯片技术是一种全新微量分析技术，目前已经成为研究的热点之一。
